Headline: Harry S. Truman Sits on a Piano
Caption-Abstract: Harry S. Truman sits on a piano while a unidentified girl plays and sings. This is a faked photograph.

Headline: Lauren Bacall on Piano, Truman Playing
Caption-Abstract: Vice-President Harry S. Truman accompanies actress Lauren Bacall on the piano at the National Press Club canteen.

Headline: President Truman and Sergeant Eugene List
Caption-Abstract: President Harry S. Truman receiving a copy of sheet music by Chopin
